    • iGCD

      static int iGCD(int x, int y)
      Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) or HCF Given two number x and y. Find the greatest common divisor of x and y using recursion. Constraints: 0 invalid input: '<'= x, y invalid input: '<'= 1e6 24 = 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 15 = 1, 3, 5, 15 Common Divisor = 1, 3 GCD = 3

    • rGCD

      static int rGCD(int x, int y)
      Euclid's Algorithm. gcd(x,y) = gcd(y, x % y); gcd(x,0) = x; gcd(25,15) = gcd(15,9) = gcd(9,6) = gcd(6,3) = gcd(3,0) = 3

    • LCM

      static int LCM(int x, int y)
      LCM(x,y) * GCD(x,y) = x * y; LCM(x,y) = ((x * y) / GCD(x,y));

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
